name: Anti Gameshow
description:
You've finally been selected to participate in a game show! But, you have to give as many wrong answers as possible? What!? (Meaning: Get the lowest possible score, with -15 being the best possible score!)

Music/sound credits:

https://freesound.org/people/thisusernameis/sounds/432837/
